meanings.definition: To surpass in striving or competing.
meanings.sent1: She outstrives her classmates in every race.
meanings.sent2: He always outstrives himself to do better each day.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outstrives the big grasshopper in gathering food.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outstrives any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun outstrives the clouds, shining brightly in the sky.

meanings.definition: To outdo in effort or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The team outstrives their opponents in every game.
meanings.sent2: She outstrives her personal best time in every race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outstrives the birds in collecting nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His dedication outstrives any challenge that comes his way.
meanings.sent5: The river outstrives its banks during heavy rainfall, flooding the fields.
